meanings.definition: A device used to measure the concentration of sugar in a liquid.
meanings.sent1: The saccharimeter showed the sugar level in the juice.
meanings.sent2: The bakery used a saccharimeter to check the sweetness of the syrup.
meanings.sent3: The saccharimeter decided the fate of the dessert's sweetness.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as sweet as the reading on the saccharimeter.
meanings.sent5: The saccharimeter beeped happily as it detected the sugar content.

meanings.definition: A tool that determines the amount of sugar present in a solution.
meanings.sent1: The saccharimeter indicated the sugar content in the drink.
meanings.sent2: Using the saccharimeter, the chef adjusted the sugar level in the recipe.
meanings.sent3: The saccharimeter played a crucial role in the sugar experiment.
meanings.sent4: His words were as sugary as the saccharimeter's reading.
meanings.sent5: The saccharimeter hummed softly, revealing the sweetness of the solution.
